channel.title: Dwarf cannon
channel.description:
Hello,
If use you use a cannon, does it get your hp up or just ranged? hopefully just ranged, please could you post and tell me.
Thanks

item.title: Dwarf cannon
item.dc:creator: @phonnygoblin phonnygoblin
item.description:
@phonnygoblin wrote:

Right… “It degrades and when it does it disappears.” Isn’t that exactly the answer? It is “quite”?

Read full topic

item.title: Dwarf cannon
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“JaydenD12, post:1, topic:250172”][quote author=Wrauld link=topic=328918.msg2577763#msg2577763 date=1229051972]

Could I setup the cannon at rock crabs, and go the GE?

Or does I have to be there?

Btw every 15-25mins you need to pick up your cannon and re-set it so it dosen’t dissapeare.

And if it does go to the dwarfs by barbarian village and they give you it for free

it dosen’t disapear…

[/quote]

Yes it does, It degrades and when it does it disappears.

You have to speak to the dwarfs to get it back.

Idiot.[/quote]

Not quite, the cannon will disappear only if you go too far from it, log out, or it has fired 1500 cannonballs.

Read full topic

item.title: Dwarf cannon
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

[quote=“casey., post:3, topic:249552”]Could I setup the cannon at rock crabs, and go the GE?

Or does I have to be there?[/quote]

The cannon only has enough space for 30 balls(I think) so no, no you can’t.
